name: course_mean-musify
description: MEAN-Musify: Desarrollo web con JavaScript, Angular, NodeJS y MongoDB
author: Mauro Daniel Viveros <maurod.viveros@gmail.com> (TRY Ubbe)

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && npm version major -f && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && npm version minor -f && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && npm version patch -f && git push && git push --tags
